character.name: Ken Masters
character.description: Aggressive shoto with run cancels and rekka pressure
character.bio: Former US National Fighting Champ, and ex-VP of the Masters Foundation. Accusations of orchestrating a criminal plot have forced Ken to abandon his family and business and go into hiding.

neutral.name: Neutral Tactics
neutral.description: Moves for controlling space and starting offense

offensive.name: Offensive Pressure
offensive.description: Moves for maintaining pressure and mix-ups

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure and frame traps. Can be rapid canceled.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Very safe. Can be rapid canceled.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for quick pokes and pressure
Use for spacing and confirms into specials
Use for max range control in neutral

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Heavy normal for damage and confirms
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for counter hits and big damage confirms
Use for counter hits. 2 frames recovery added on armor hit or whiff. Forces spinning knockdown on Punish Counter.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Forces spinning knockdown on Punish Counter.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Fast crouching jab with rapid cancel
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure and light confirms. Can be rapid canceled.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Very safe. Can be rapid canceled.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for low mixups and tick throws. Can be rapid canceled.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe low option. Must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Primary punish for -6 moves. 2 frames recovery added on whiff.
Use for low pokes and spacing. Cancelable.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Punishable by 6-frame moves. Must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Forces standing on hit. Can cancel until 2nd active frame.
Use for knockdown. Hard Knockdown on Punish Counter. 1 frame recovery added when blocked.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Causes knockdown. Must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for air-to-air situations
Use for air-to-air or cross-ups. Has cross-up properties.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Air normal with cross-up properties. 3 frames landing recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for air-to-air. Forces juggle on mid-air hit.
Use for jump-ins and cross-ups. Has cross-up properties.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Air normal with cross-up properties. 3 frames landing recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for jump-ins. Slam knockdown on counter/Punish Counter vs air.
Use for jump-ins with good horizontal range
Use for neutral jump situations
Use to close distance and access follow-up attacks. Can transition to branching attacks from frame 12.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Movement option. Watch for follow-up attacks.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to bait reactions or stop safely

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Ken stops his run. Can act after.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos. Can be canceled into Level 3 Super Art or Critical Art.
Use for combo starters. Can be canceled into any Super Art.
Use for confirms into specials.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 14. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Second hit of target combo. Can continue to third hit.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 12. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Final hit of target combo. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 11. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for zoning and space control. Slowest version.
Use for zoning with medium speed
Use for faster zoning and pressure
Use for pressure and combos. Plus on hit.
Use as anti-air. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-14. Airborne frames 7-35. Does 800 damage from 3rd active frame.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 23. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air or combo ender. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-8. Airborne frames 8-43.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 28. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as anti-air. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-9. Projectile invincible frames 5-11. Airborne frames 9-51.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 36. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as reversal. Completely invincible frames 1-10. Airborne frames 9-24 and 33-74.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 40. Full combo punish.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for surprise anti-air or combo ender. Invincible vs mid-air projectiles and strikes with mid-air hitboxes frames 1-18. Projectile invincible frames 3-11. Airborne frames 11-51.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: DEATH ON BLOCK. Minus 35. Full combo punish.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 12. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for max damage combos. Airborne frames 10-77.
Use for combo extensions. Does not hit opponent in front on 2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, 10th hits. Airborne frames 10-61.
Use for air approaches. 14 frames landing recovery. Airborne frames 10-61.
Use for air approaches. Does not hit opponent in front on 2nd and 4th attacks. 2nd and 4th attacks do 700 damage and +600 SA gauge. 7 frames recovery added on whiff. Airborne frames 10-77.
Use for approach and pressure. Does not hit grounded opponents frames 18-20. Does 950 damage from frames 21-23. Airborne frames 9-28.
Use for approach. Does not hit grounded opponents frames 23-24. Airborne frames 14-32.
Use for pressure. PLUS ON BLOCK (+1). Does not hit grounded opponents frames 28-29. Airborne frames 19-37.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PLUS ON BLOCK! Ken can continue pressure.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combos. Does not hit grounded opponents frames 9-12 and 18. Airborne frames 10-27. No additional combo scaling if 2nd hit connects.

properties.comboScaling: Starter scaling 10%, 5% Immediate scaling on 2nd hit

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for run mixups. Does not hit grounded opponents frames 9-12 and 18-19. Airborne frames 10-28. No additional combo scaling if 2nd hit connects.

properties.comboScaling: Starter scaling 10%, 5% Immediate scaling on 2nd hit

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure strings. Can transition to Kazekama Shin Kick and Gorai Axe Kick frames 32-35. Can transition to Senka Snap Kick frames 30-35.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block if no follow-up. Minus 11.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure. Can transition to Kazekama Shin Kick and Gorai Axe Kick frames 32-35. Can transition to Senka Snap Kick frames 30-35.
Use for pressure. Only -2 on block. Can transition to Kazekama Shin Kick and Gorai Axe Kick frames 36-41. Can transition to Senka Snap Kick frames 34-41. Causes knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Only minus 2. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for pressure. Can transition to OD Kazekama Shin Kick and OD Gorai Axe Kick frames 21-27. Can transition to OD Senka Snap Kick frames 19-27.
Use for low mixup. Knockdown on Counter or Punish Counter. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. LOW - must be blocked low.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for low mixup. Can transition to Kasai Thrust Kick from frame 11. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. LOW - must be blocked low.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 12. Causes knockdown.

Use for mid option. Can transition to Kasai Thrust Kick from frame 24. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.
Use to end rekka string. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 12. Causes knockdown.

Use to end rekka string. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 20. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as reversal or combo ender. Invincible to strikes and throws frames 1-9. Minimum damage 30%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.
Use for combo damage. Transitions to full attack after 6th hit. Minimum damage 40%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.

Use for max damage or reversal. Completely invincible frames 1-18. Minimum damage 50%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. Can only be canceled into from special moves. If first hit blocked/whiffs: 2100 damage, -9000 Drive Gauge, no cinematic.

Use for max damage when under 25% health. Completely invincible frames 1-18. Minimum damage 50%. Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. Can only be canceled into from special moves. If first hit blocked/whiffs: 2300 damage, -16000 Drive Gauge, no cinematic.
Use for throw mixups. On Punish Counter: 2040 damage, +4000 SA gauge, hard knockdown.
Use for side switch and corner carry. On Punish Counter: 2040 damage, +4000 SA gauge, hard knockdown.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Throw. Tech with LP+LK. Switches sides.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to close distance quickly

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Quick backward movement with throw invincibility
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure. Invincible to throws frames 1-15.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Armored attack for pressure and punishes
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to absorb attacks and punish. Super Armor for 2 hits frames 1-27. Wall splat on hit near wall. On Punish Counter or after armor absorb: crumple stun (grounded), spinning knockdown (airborne), +3000 SA gauge.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Has Super Armor. Counter with your own Drive Impact or throw.

ken_drive_reversal_block.input: → + HP + HK (while blocking or during Drive Parry)

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure while blocking. Completely invincible frames 1-22. Recoverable damage. 5 frames recovery added on hit.
Use to escape oki pressure. Completely invincible frames 1-20. Recoverable damage. 5 frames recovery added on hit.
Use to parry attacks. Can cancel from frame 4 via Drive Rush. Parry hitbox extended while buttons held. Only blocks during recovery. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Ken is in Punish Counter state. Throw or wait for recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when attack absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. For high/overhead: press away. For low: press down-back. No direction = regular parry +3000 Drive. Fully invincible 5 frames after recovery (not if continuing parry). Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when projectile absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. No screen freeze. Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to convert parry into offense. Screen freeze until frame 10. Can cancel into attack on frame 9. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 24.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Ken is rushing in. Prepare to block or contest.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Cancel normal into run for combos
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combo extensions. Screen freeze until frame 9. Can cancel into attack from frame 10. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 25.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Ken is canceling into run. Prepare for follow-up.
